main_topic.author: Rinku Sahu
main_topic.title: I am not able to create a kaggle environments for 'llm_20_question'

comments.author: Josef Leutgeb
comments.content:
I had the same Issue. Check 

import kaggle_environments

kaggle_environments.__version__

If it is below 1.14.11 do 

pip install kaggle_environments==1.14.11

and restart the kernel.
comments.date: Posted 2 months ago  ·  708th in this Competition

reply.author: Rinku SahuTopic Author
reply.content: I tried to install newer version and then did import but still it is showing older version of package.

comments.author: Bovard Doerschuk-Tiberi
comments.content: What version of kaggle-environments are you using? Make sure it's the latest (>= 1.14.11)

reply.author: Rinku SahuTopic Author
reply.content:
I tried to install the '1.14.11' version but after importing and checking version, it is still showing the '1.14.11'.  following things I tried

Uninstall the package '',  but import kaggle_environments still works and gives 1.14.9 version. 
After uninstallation, again installed it but still showing older version 1.14.9.
After Installation, I tried to restart the kernal but still older version
